data.comment: The big names in today's match at AFAS Stadion have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 5, Goal! Alkmaar have got their heads in front thanks to a Calvin Stengs strike.
Teun Koopmeiners with an assist there.
Pantelis Chatzidiakos is booked for the home team.
In the minute 38, Sylla Sow (Waalwijk) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Ola John.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Waalwijk make their second substitution with Ayman Azhil replacing Nicolas Olsak.
At AFAS Stadion, Cyril Ngonge has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Lennerd Daneels is on a sub for Vitalie Damascan for Waalwijk.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Luuk Wouters with Paul Quasten.
An attacking Alkmaar player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Alkmaar are awarded a penalty ... Teun Koopmeiners botches the spot kick!
In the minute 71, Myron Boadu (Alkmaar) has replaced the possibly injured Bruno Martins Indi at AFAS Stadion.
Goal! Alkmaar extend their lead to 2-0 through Albert Gudmundsson.
Jesper Karlsson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 75, Arne Slot is making the team's second substitution at AFAS Stadion with Zakaria Aboukhlal replacing Calvin Stengs.
Yukinari Sugawara is replacing Jonas Svensson for Alkmaar at AFAS Stadion.
The away team have replaced Cyril Ngonge with Finn Stokkers. This is the fifth substitution made today by Fred Grim.
In the minute 83, Ayman Azhil (Waalwijk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Timo Letschert is replacing Pantelis Chatzidiakos for the home team.
Alkmaar make their fifth substitution with Tijani Reijnders replacing Jesper Karlsson.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
Goal! Albert Gudmundsson extends Alkmaar's lead to 3-0.
That's a fine assist from Owen Wijndal.
